data.description:
**💥🏋️‍♂️New ‘POWER UP’ Fitness Album Free Release!💥🏋️‍♂️**

Enjoy your favorite rhythm game, OhShape, and engage your entire body with our new fitness album ‘Power Up’!

{429322950075407}

In addition to the classic wall-punching, obstacle-dodging, and fun pose-making, get your full-body cardio workout with 6 new sessions and 2 difficulty levels, designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!

🦵Leg Burner

💪Arm Assault, Shoulders Up

🏃Endurancer

🏋️‍♂️Body Blast, All Out

Jump into this fun-filled VR fitness album with OhShape by Odders Lab🤸

{6890711177698490}

# Key Features

🕺Fun poses and catchy music to keep you moving

▶️ Modern & dynamic looks, and a much friendlier onboarding for new users.

🥽 A great gateway into the VR rhythm world but also a real challenge for the most seasoned players.

🎉 Electro Party DLC now for free

💪 Fun and great workout for your whole body

⛰️ More than 40 stages with 4 difficulty levels

🏋️‍♂️ Practice Mode: practice level sections to perfection!

🏅 Cross-platform online leaderboard

**Join our Discord Channel for our monthly challenges and get ahead of OhShape’s 5 year anniversary celebrations!**

changelog.change_log:
New ‘POWER UP’ Fitness Album Free Release!

- 6 new sessions with 2 difficulty levels
-  Content designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!
- New environment, mixed reality version too
- Quality of life improvements

OhShape 2.3.50 - MR Update: All the content and no walls limitation. - November 2023

First update of OhShape MR!

After the release of the new mode, we have been working on improving your favorite rhythm game. What will we find in this new version?

- We have removed the four-wall limit. Now any kind of room will be valid to play.
- We have adjusted the minimum distances from the walls to make the game more accessible to everyone!
- All the content of the VR version is now available on MR. Album 1 and the exclusive Caravan Palace DLC will be available in this update.
- And as always, we've taken the opportunity to fix a few small bugs.

Let’s keep enjoying!

OhShape 2.2.50 - MR Update - October 2023

A game of walls without walls? This is OhShape Ultimate in MR, and it's possible!

Enjoy the latest update, which allows you to experience some of your favorite OhShape content in Mixed Reality (MR)!
This new update includes:

- Mixed Reality mode, available both in the main menu and during gameplay. Activate it from the menu button and prepare to be amazed!
- New exclusive mechanics in MR mode such as silhouettes and wall changes. Now you can play OhShape on three different walls!
- Don't worry about these changes; everything is explained when you enter the new mode through a brief introduction.
- Exclusive challenges for our levels in MR!
- Outside of MR, we've made modifications to the Custom Songs system to ensure compatibility with the new times.
- And as always, many improvements here and there, and removed a couple of small bugs :)


Enjoy this new and upgraded version of OhShape and do not stop dancing!

OHSHAPE ULTIMATE 2.1.2 - Covers & Leaderboards - June 2023
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A new quality-of-life update is here!

This version includes:

- A new visual style on the covers for all songs - they couldn't look any cooler!
- A brand new leaderboard now including your friends’ highscores!
- Sound experience has reached new grounds of quality!
- Our disclaimers also got a revamp to ensure everyone enjoys the experience and has solutions at hand at all times!
- And as always, many improvements here and there, and removed a couple of small bugs :)

Enjoy this new and upgraded version of OhShape and do not stop dancing!

*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
The fresh and definitive version of the popular rhythm game is here! With astonishing new visuals, more content, new environments and more! Take a look at these extra features:
• New super cool menu environment to choose your favorite songs from
• Freshly improved interface with a modern style
• New Asian environment for the third album
• The tutorial level now features a more pleasant flow for newcomers
• We prepared a small gift by adding two new songs and now the “Electro Party” DLC is available for all users for free!

Let's enjoy it!

-----------

*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
¡Ya está aquí la versión renovada y definitiva del popular juego de ritmo! Con asombrosos efectos visuales, más contenido, nuevos entornos y mucho más. Echa un vistazo a estas características extra:
- Nuevo entorno de menú súper chulo para elegir tus canciones favoritas
- Interfaz recién mejorada con un estilo moderno
- Nuevo entorno asiático para el tercer álbum
- El nivel tutorial ahora presenta un flujo más agradable para los recién llegados
- Hemos preparado un pequeño regalo añadiendo dos nuevas canciones y además... ¡Ahora el DLC "Electro Party" está disponible para todos los usuarios de forma gratuita!

¡A disfrutar!

----------


*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
Faites place à la toute nouvelle version du fameux jeu de rythme ! Avec de nouveaux visuels étonnants, plus de contenu, de nouveaux environnements et plus encore ! Jetez un coup d'œil à ces nouvelles fonctionnalités :

• Nouvelle conception du menu, super cool pour choisir vos chansons préférées,
• Interface fraîchement améliorée avec un style moderne,
• Nouvel environnement asiatique pour le troisième album,
• Le niveau tutoriel offre désormais une progression plus fluide pour les nouveaux joueurs,
• Nous vous avons préparé un petit cadeau en ajoutant deux nouvelles chansons et en mettant le DLC « Electro Party » à disposition de tous les utilisateurs de manière complètement gratuite !

profitons-en!

-----------

*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
Die neue und endgültige Version des beliebten Rhythmusspiels ist da! Mit erstaunlicher neuer Grafik, mehr Inhalten, neuen Umgebungen und mehr! Werfen Sie einen Blick auf diese zusätzlichen Funktionen:

• Neue supercoole Menüumgebung, aus der Sie Ihre Lieblingssongs auswählen können
• Frisch verbesserte Benutzeroberfläche mit modernem Stil
• Neue asiatische Umgebung für das dritte Album
• Das Tutorial-Level bietet jetzt einen angenehmeren Ablauf für Neueinsteiger
• Wir haben ein kleines Geschenk vorbereitet, indem wir zwei neue Songs hinzugefügt haben, und jetzt ist der DLC „Electro Party“ für alle Benutzer kostenlos verfügbar!

lasst es uns genießen!

-----------

*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
本热门节奏游戏的全新完整版本现已发布！惊人的全新视觉效果、更多内容、新环境以及其他更新！请查看以下这些新增功能：

• 全新的超赞菜单环境，您可以从中选择您最喜欢的歌曲
• 界面全新升级，采用现代风格
• 为第三张专辑提供全新亚洲环境
• 新手现在可以在教学级别中获得更顺畅的体验
• 我们准备了一份小礼物：新增了两首歌曲，并向所有用户免费开放“Electro Party” DLC！


-----------

*OHSHAPE ULTIMATE*
人気リズムゲームの最新決定版が登場！驚きの新ビジュアル、追加コンテンツ、新環境など盛りだくさん！追加機能をご覧ください：

•お気に入りの曲を選ぶための超クールで新しいメニュー環境
•モダンなスタイルで新しく改良されたインターフェース
• サードアルバムに向けた新しいアジア環境
•チュートリアルレベルが初心者にとってさらに快適になりました
•2つの新曲を追加するささやかなプレゼントを用意したほか、DLC「Electro party」を全ユーザーに無料配布！


-----------

*오쉐이프 얼티메이트*
인기 리듬 게임의 새롭고 인상적인 버전을 지금 만나보세요! 놀랍도록 새로운 비주얼, 더 많은 콘텐츠, 새로운 환경 등이 기다립니다! 다음과 같은 추가 기능이 제공됩니다.

• 좋아하는 노래를 선택할 수 있는 새롭고 환상적인 메뉴 환경
• 모던한 스타일로 새롭게 개선된 인터페이스
• 세 번째 앨범을 위한 새로운 아시아 환경
• 신규 이용자가 더 큰 즐거움을 느낄 수 있는 튜토리얼 레벨
• 여러분께 드리는 작은 선물로 신곡 두 곡을 추가했으며, 이제 모든 이용자가 “일렉트로 파티” DLC를 무료로 이용할 수 있습니다!

**OhShape 1.9.77 - Shade improvement - August 2022**

There is always room for improvement, so we bring you a better shade in this new version of OhShape. This new shade is better stylized and more loyal to your movements. It may not seem like much, but the greatness of games is in the details.

Let's go!

**OhShape 1.9.77 - Shade improvement - August 2022**

There is always room for improvement, so we bring you a better shade in this new version of OhShape. This new shade is better stylized and more loyal to your movements. It may not seem like much, but the greatness of games is in the details.

Let's go!

OhShape v.1.9.68 - Flow Update
At OhShape we have keep working on improving the feeling of the game, and here are some Quality of Life improvements requested by our community in the past months:
-Improved feedback when you pass through the walls
-Better Auto-recentering adjustments
-More natural hand position
-More satisfying coin FXs
-Various bug fixes

v 1.9.5 - Content Update - February 2022
———————————————————————————————
• 4 New Songs on Album 3
• We played catch & seek with some small bugs, and came out victorious!

v 1.9.0 - Caravan Palace Music Pack Update - July 2021
———————————————————————————————
• New Album: Caravan Palace Music Pack DLC with an exclusive sci-fi environment!
• We played catch & seek with some bugs, and won!

v 1.8.5 - Tiësto Update - March 2021
—————————————————————
• New Song: Added ‘Show me’ song from Tiësto to Electro Party DLC for free!
• Some feedback improvements upon failing and passing a wall
• Shadow improvements: your human shadow behaves more accurately!
• Found some little bugs, and splashed them!

v 1.8.0 - Electro Party - Holidays 2020
—————————————————————
• New Album: Electro Party DLC with an exclusive dark environment!
• A time-limited holiday theme, play it now!
• Challenges & Leaderboards have arrived for you in Quest to show off your skills with the community!
• Some love for the newcomers:
  • New difficulty naming
  • Enhanced tutorial to get you ready for the fun!
  • Improved feedback upon failing a wall
• Small room mode upgraded
• We found a few little bugs and we took care of them!

v 1.7.0 - Tower Reloaded - 29 Oct 2020
—————————————————————
- Halloween mode with pumpkins, bats and skulls, really spooky (for a limited time!)
- Tower scenery reloaded, check it out!
- Friends Leaderboard
- Player stats panel
- Sparks FX for the hands on the dodge walls
- Improvements on the custom songs screen: added a reload button and new UI
- Improvements on the 'small room' mode
- 'Remove HUD' option
- Oculus' Mix Reality Capture integrated in options
- Found some bugs, and got rid of them

v 1.6.0 - Carry On - 3 Sep 2020
—————————————————————
- Added the Carry On album & song by F.O.O.L / Monstercat
- Minor bugs fixed

v 1.5.4 - Trophies FIX - 21 Aug 2020
—————————————————————
- Bug fixes

v 1.5.3 - Ice Planet - 20 Aug 2020
—————————————————————
- New ‘Ice Planet’ Environment
- Added 3 new songs to Album #3
- Added Achievements & Trophies
- New Onboarding Screen
- Minor bugs fixed

v 1.5.3 - Ice Planet - 20 Aug 2020
—————————————————————
- New ‘Ice Planet’ Environment
- Added 3 new songs to Album #3
- Added Achievements & Trophies
- New Onboarding Screen
- Minor bugs fixed

v 1.4.5 - Ghost Walls FIX - 20 Jul 2020
—————————————————————
- YUR SDK updated
- Bug fixes

v 1.4.4 - Album 3 & Performance FIX - 17 Jul 2020
—————————————————————
- New Album 3 with 4 new songs!
- Heavy performance upgrade
- 4 new languages supported: French, German, Japanese and Korean
- Haptic feedback improvements
- Minor bugs fixed

v 1.4.4 - Album 3 & Performance FIX - 17 Jul 2020
—————————————————————
- Added Album 3 with 4 new songs
- Big performance improvements
- Support for 4 new languages: French, German, Japanese and Korean
- Haptic improvements
- Minor bugs fixed

v 1.3.8 - Tracking FIX - 26 Jun 2020
—————————————————————
- Game now checks & corrects controller tracking state
- Performance improved
- No Fail mode has no negative feedback now
- Minor bugs fixed
